channel.title: CVE Feed for Flexera Software LLC -- GnuTLS libtasn1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flexera Software LLC -- GnuTLS libtasn1

item.title: CVE-2017-6891|2024-08-05T15:41:17.677Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- gnutls%20libtasn1
item.description: Two errors in the "asn1_find_node()" function (lib/parser_aux.c) within GnuTLS libtasn1 version 4.10 can be exploited to cause a stacked-based buffer overflow by tricking a user into processing a specially crafted assignments file via the e.g. asn1Coding utility.
